name: gedcom-shell-navigator
description: Interactive shell-like navigator for GEDCOM genealogy files

scripts.build: npm run bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --public-packages "*" --targets node20-win-x64 --output ged.exe
scripts.build:win-arm64: npm run bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --public-packages "*" --targets node20-win-arm64 --output ged-arm64.exe
scripts.build:windows: npm run bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --public-packages "*" --targets node20-win-x64,node20-win-arm64 --output ged
